refsect1.programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform -odac ;;;realtime audio out ;-iadc ;;;uncomment -iadc if realtime audio input is needed too ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o voice.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
sr = 44100 ksmps = 32 nchnls = 2 0dbfs = 1
instr 1
kamp = p4 kphon = p5 asig voice kamp, 200, kphon, 0.488, 0, 1, 1, 2 outs asig, asig
endin </CsInstruments> <CsScore> f 1 0 256 1 "impuls20.aiff" 0 0 0 ;audio file for the carrier waveform f 2 0 256 10 1 ;sine wave for the vibrato waveform
; ampl phoneme i 1 0 2 0.8 1 i 1 + . 0.6 2 i 1 + . 1.8 3 i 1 + . 15.0 4 i 1 + . 0.05 5 i 1 + . 0.06 6 i 1 + . 0.03 7 i 1 + . 0.0002 8 i 1 + . 0.1 9 i 1 + . 0.5 10 i 1 + . 100 11 i 1 + . 0.03 12 i 1 + . 0.04 13 i 1 + . 0.04 14 i 1 + . 0.04 15 i 1 + . 0.05 16
e </CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
